introduction.title: Introduction to FortressAuth
introduction.description: FortressAuth is a secure-by-default, database-agnostic authentication library built with TypeScript and hexagonal architecture.
introduction.whatIsDescription: FortressAuth is a production-ready authentication library that provides secure user authentication, session management, email verification, and password reset functionality.

features.secureByDefaultDesc: Argon2id password hashing, split session tokens, timing-attack prevention, and rate limiting built-in.
features.databaseAgnosticDesc: Works with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite via the SQL adapter.
features.emailAgnosticDesc: Pluggable email providers including Console, Resend, AWS SES, SendGrid, and SMTP.
features.hexagonalDesc: Clean separation between business logic and infrastructure with zero dependencies in core.
features.typeSafeDesc: Written in TypeScript with comprehensive type definitions.

introduction.architectureDescription: FortressAuth follows a ports-and-adapters (hexagonal) architecture pattern.

components.fortressAuth: The main orchestrator class that coordinates all authentication operations.
components.authRepository: The persistence layer interface for storing users, accounts, sessions, and tokens.
components.emailProvider: A pluggable service for sending verification and password reset emails.
components.rateLimiter: A component that limits authentication attempts.

installation.nextStepsDesc: Now that you have FortressAuth installed, check out the Quick Start guide.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Get up and running with FortressAuth in minutes.
quickStart.overviewDesc: This guide will walk you through setting up a basic authentication system with FortressAuth.
quickStart.step2Desc: Create a FortressAuth instance with your configuration:
quickStart.step3Desc: Use the signUp method to create a new user:
quickStart.step4Desc: Authenticate users with the signIn method:

quickStart.whatNextDesc: Now that you have basic authentication working, explore these topics:

whatNextLinks.sdks: Use client SDKs for React, Vue, or Angular

fortressAuth.title: FortressAuth Class
fortressAuth.description: The main orchestrator class for all authentication operations.
fortressAuth.constructorDesc: Creates a new FortressAuth instance with the provided configuration.
fortressAuth.signUpDesc: Creates a new user account with email and password.
fortressAuth.signInDesc: Authenticates a user and creates a new session.
fortressAuth.validateSessionDesc: Validates a session token and returns the user.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.sessionTtlDesc: Session token time-to-live in milliseconds. Default: 7 days.
configuration.emailVerificationTtlDesc: Email verification token TTL. Default: 24 hours.
configuration.passwordResetTtlDesc: Password reset token TTL. Default: 1 hour.
configuration.lockoutThresholdDesc: Number of failed attempts before lockout. Default: 5.

errorCodes.title: Error Codes
errorCodes.description: Error codes returned by FortressAuth operations.

codes.EMAIL_EXISTS: The email address is already registered.
codes.INVALID_CREDENTIALS: The email or password is incorrect.
codes.PASSWORD_TOO_WEAK: The password does not meet requirements.
codes.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: The email address has not been verified.
codes.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_INVALID: The email verification token is invalid.
codes.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_EXPIRED: The email verification token has expired.
codes.PASSWORD_RESET_INVALID: The password reset token is invalid.
codes.PASSWORD_RESET_EXPIRED: The password reset token has expired.
codes.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests. Please try again later.

hero.title: FortressAuth
hero.subtitle: Autenticação Segura por Padrão
hero.description: Uma biblioteca de autenticação pronta para produção construida com TypeScript e arquitetura hexagonal. Agnóstica de banco de dados, agnóstica de provedor de e-mail e segura por padrão.

secureByDefault.title: Seguro por Padrão
secureByDefault.description: Hash Argon2id, tokens divididos e prevenção de ataques de temporização integrados

databaseAgnostic.title: Banco de Dados Agnóstico
databaseAgnostic.description: Funciona com PostgreSQL, MySQL e SQLite nativamente

fastIntegration.title: Integração Rápida
fastIntegration.description: Comece em minutos com SDKs para React, Vue ou Angular

productionReady.title: Pronto para Produção
productionReady.description: Limitação de taxa, bloqueio de conta e verificação de e-mail incluídos

features.title: Construído para Segurança e Flexibilidade
features.subtitle: Tudo o que você precisa para implementar autenticação segura sem comprometer a experiência do desenvolvedor

secureByDefault.title: Seguro por Padrão
secureByDefault.description: Hash de senha Argon2id com parâmetros recomendados pela OWASP, tokens de sessão divididos e prevenção de ataques de temporização

databaseAgnostic.title: Banco de Dados Agnóstico
databaseAgnostic.description: Funciona perfeitamente com PostgreSQL, MySQL e SQLite via construtor de consultas Kysely

productionReady.title: Pronto para Produção
productionReady.description: Verificação de e-mail, redefinição de senha, limitação de taxa (memória/Redis), bloqueio de conta e gerenciamento de sessão
